# [Interview #1052: WOR Signing Table Q&A, Entry #102](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1052#102)

#### Leiyan

There are three planets in the system, are they all in the habitable zone? At least two of them must be â€¦
Q2(I think this was NutiketAiel?). When you say three, is it actually three in the solar system, or is it three-?

#### Brandon Sanderson

There are three planets with sentient beings on them.
